property.name: ranger.service.host
property.description: Host where ranger service to be installed

property.name: ranger.service.http.enabled
property.description: Enable HTTP

property.name: ranger.service.http.port
property.description: HTTP port

property.name: ranger.service.https.port
property.description: HTTPS port (if SSL is enabled)

property.name: ranger.service.https.attrib.ssl.enabled
property.description: true/false, set to true if using SSL

property.name: ranger.service.https.attrib.clientAuth
property.description: Needs to be set to want for two way SSL

property.name: ranger.service.https.attrib.keystore.keyalias
property.description: Alias for Ranger Admin key in keystore

property.name: ranger.service.https.attrib.keystore.pass
property.description: Password for keystore

property.name: ranger.https.attrib.keystore.file
property.description: Ranger admin keystore (specify full path)

property.name: ranger.externalurl
property.description: URL to be used by clients to access ranger admin

property.name: ranger.jpa.jdbc.driver
property.description: JDBC driver class name. Example: For Mysql: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver, For Oracle: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver
property.display-name: Driver class name for a JDBC Ranger database

property.name: ranger.jpa.jdbc.url
property.description: JDBC connect string - auto populated based on other values

property.name: ranger.jpa.jdbc.user
property.description: JDBC user

property.name: ranger.jpa.jdbc.password
property.description: JDBC password

property.name: ranger.jpa.jdbc.credential.alias
property.description: Alias name for storing JDBC password

property.name: ranger.credential.provider.path
property.description: File for credential store, provide full file path

property.name: ranger.audit.source.type
property.description: db or solr, based on the audit destination used

property.name: ranger.audit.solr.urls
property.description: Solr url for audit. Example: http://solr_host:6083/solr/ranger_audits

property.name: ranger.authentication.method
property.description: Ranger admin Authentication - UNIX/LDAP/AD/NONE

property.name: ranger.ldap.url
property.description: LDAP Server URL, only used if Authentication method is LDAP

property.name: ranger.ldap.user.dnpattern
property.description: LDAP user DN, only used if Authentication method is LDAP

property.name: ranger.ldap.group.searchbase
property.description: LDAP group searchbase, only used if Authentication method is LDAP

property.name: ranger.ldap.group.searchfilter
property.description: LDAP group search filter, only used if Authentication method is LDAP

property.name: ranger.ldap.user.searchfilter
property.description: Search filter used for Bind Authentication

property.name: ranger.ldap.group.roleattribute
property.description: LDAP group role attribute, only used if Authentication method is LDAP

property.name: ranger.ldap.base.dn
property.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the starting point for directory server searches.

property.name: ranger.ldap.bind.dn
property.description: Full distinguished name (DN), including common name (CN), of an LDAP user account that has privileges to search for users.

property.name: ranger.ldap.bind.password
property.description: Password for the account that can search for users

property.name: ranger.ldap.referral
property.description: Set to follow if multiple LDAP servers are configured to return continuation references for results. Set to ignore (default) if no referrals should be followed

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.domain
property.description: AD domain, only used if Authentication method is AD

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.url
property.description: AD URL, only used if Authentication method is AD

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.base.dn
property.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the starting point for directory server searches.

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.bind.dn
property.description: Full distinguished name (DN), including common name (CN), of an LDAP user account that has privileges to search for users.

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.bind.password
property.description: Password for the account that can search for users

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.user.searchfilter
property.description: Search filter used for Bind Authentication

property.name: ranger.ldap.ad.referral
property.description: "Set to follow if multiple LDAP servers are configured to return continuation references for results. Set to ignore (default) if no referrals should be followed"

property.name: ranger.jpa.audit.jdbc.driver
property.description: JDBC driver class name - for audit DB

property.name: ranger.jpa.audit.jdbc.url
property.description: JDBC connect string - auto populated based on other values

property.name: ranger.jpa.audit.jdbc.user
property.description: JDBC user - audit

property.name: ranger.jpa.audit.jdbc.password
property.description: JDBC password - audit

property.name: ranger.jpa.audit.jdbc.credential.alias
property.description: Alias name for storing JDBC password - for audit user

property.name: ranger.unixauth.remote.login.enabled
property.description: Remote login enabled? - only used if Authentication method is UNIX

property.name: ranger.unixauth.service.hostname
property.description: Host where unix authentication service is running - only used if Authentication method is UNIX

property.name: ranger.unixauth.service.port
property.description: Port for unix authentication service - only used if Authentication method is UNIX

property.name: ranger.jpa.jdbc.dialect
property.description: JDBC dialect used for policy DB

property.name: ranger.jpa.audit.jdbc.dialect
property.description: JDBC dialect used for audit DB

property.name: ranger.audit.solr.zookeepers
property.description: Solr Zookeeper string

property.name: ranger.audit.solr.username
property.description: Solr username

property.name: ranger.audit.solr.password
property.description: Solr password

property.name: ranger.sso.providerurl
property.description: Example: https://KNOX_HOST:KNOX_PORT/gateway/TOPOLOGY_NAME/knoxsso/api/v1/websso

property.name: ranger.sso.publicKey
property.description: Public key for SSO cookie verification

property.name: ranger.sso.cookiename
property.description: Parameter name for SSO cookie

property.name: ranger.sso.query.param.originalurl
property.description: Query name for appending original url in SSO url

property.name: ranger.sso.browser.useragent
property.description: Comma seperated browser agent
